text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Fuuu... Hahhh...
Fenomeno's doing meditation training. I've been coaching her, ever since the day she asked to call me "Boss".
Her talent was one reason for me to help her, sure, but more importantly―― It was her desire to show the kids her cool running.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Huff, huff, huff... ngh...!
Good, now I――

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: What!? I'll apprehend them immediately!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Gaaahh! I forgot!
Focus, focus...!
She would lose focus at even the slightest hint of an infraction. We had to figure out a way to keep her hair trigger under control...!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: Haaaa――!

Thanks to our training, her mental fortitude got a lot tougher.
She could run a great race for sure, as long as she stayed focused...!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Whazzup! Ya got yer beans clean, ya goof?!
――Huh!? Hey, what's with the silent treatment? Was it something you ate?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Phew... That sort of instigation is not going to work anymore.
...Though this is a good opportunity to speak. ――Golshi-san.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: I would like to be your opponent for the next tryout race!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
...Oho.
So the little beanie baby's playing at being a real tofu master.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
――Yeah, okay. Challenge accepted.
A hero like me's gotta take down a Beast like you, after all.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: You won't be able to joke like that for long, Golshi-san.
――Fenomeno wouldn't fall for Gold Ship's misdirection in a race, not anymore. She'd built up the force of will to stay focused.
The kids who toured Tracen the other day had been invited to watch the tryouts.
choice_data_list: Show them how cool you can run!
Show them how cool you can run!

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ――Copy. I will run to set a good example for the children, whatever it takes.
――The day of the tryouts.

text_block_list.name: Primary School Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
I heard Big Sis Golshi's gonna run! I'm so excited~!
Yay, Big Sis Golshi!

text_block_list.name: Timid Umamusume Child
text_block_list.text: Eek, that big scary girl is here too...

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Yo, you grindin' away at them beans? Shiruko, tofu, whatever beans you bring, Golshi-chan's gonna eat your plate clean!

...Huh? What, you actually eat something weird?
C'mon, Mt. Mamechin, are ya gonna erupt or what? Papparapoo!
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
...Say what you will.
This―― will be my victory.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
HUUHHH!?
Don't get overconfident, bud, you're gonna cry like a baby when I――

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: BWHAAAAT!?
And they're off! Oh, looks like Gold Ship's made a very late start! Meanwhile, Fenomeno's made a clean start, finding a good position on the inside!
text_block_list.name: Commentary
Timid Umamusume Child
text_block_list.text: ...Wahh. The scary girl... she's cool...

Big Sis Fenomeno...!
Do your best!
text_block_list.name: Primary School Umamusume
Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: HAAAAAAH!!!

text_block_list.name: Commentary
text_block_list.text:
From far outside, Gold Ship makes chase!
――Coming through the gap is Fenomeno! Fenomeno crosses the finish line!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Huff... Huff... Tsk, guess you really did change.
You shed your skin or something? What are you, a friggin' thing of tofu?

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text: ...Your cheap jabs don't work anymore. Even in the Twinkle Series, I will triumph, and set a proper example with my running!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
...Heh. I get the feeling the two of us are gonna be in it for the long haul.
――Let's meet again at the Tofu League!
Big Sis Fenomeno was so cool!
text_block_list.name: Excited Umamusume Child
Rowdy Umamusume Child
text_block_list.text: What!? Big Sis Golshi was way funnier!

The kids were totally engrossed in their debate between Team Golshi and Team Meno. 
――Fenomeno's cool running got through to them.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Boss!
Mission accompli――

Big Sis Fenomeno! You were so cool!
Um... Can I have your autograph...!?
text_block_list.name: Primary School Umamusume
Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
...! M-my deepest thanks for your support!
But this isn't a safe place to jump around so much, so please, calm down...!
Bye bye!
text_block_list.name: Primary School Umamusume
Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Have a safe trip home!
...Haha.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
Wh- Copy! Mission accomplished!
...I managed to set a good example for them, thanks to you.

text_block_list.name: Fenomeno
text_block_list.text:
...I learned how to confront my own immaturity. And it's clear to me now, just what kind of hero I'm striving to be.
...All of it, thanks to you.

I'd like you to coach me more, if you would be so kind.
Please, won't you be my boss... My trainer?
text_block_list.name: Fenomeno

text_block_list.text:
I didn't see that question coming. But I wanted kids the nation over to see her, and understand just how cool she was.
So there was only way I could answer.

――T- Thank you so much!
I'm very much looking forward to work with you, Boss!
text_block_list.name: Fenomeno

text_block_list.text:
She looked straight ahead, her eyes overflowing with justice――
Like the gallant eyes of a German Shepherd. It put a great big smile on my face.
